item.title: 7 Useful Tips for ROS Users
item.description: Earlier people had to write a large amount of code ranging from low-level driver functions to high-level control algorithms for their robots. I too experienced this pain when I started working on the underwater vehicle project in my undergraduate university. This approach sometimes made changing even one sensor
